message.body: You're at the game, aren't you? WHAT DID YOU DO TO ROY?!?!
It wasn't me. But Marlon Byrd threw a baseball at me and in my awkwardness I missed the catch and landed on my full beer, which exploded onto 3 Cubs fans. Not good.
Darn Phils fans. Always spilling beer on people!
Gotta keep up the city rep
